alert.note: Alert for Western Uinta Basin (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 10 at 4:05PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Duchesne County through 445 PM MDT... At 404 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles west of Myton, or 8 miles east of Duchesne, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Duchesne, Starvation Reservoir, Upalco, Arcadia, Utahn and Bridgeland. This includes the following highways... US Route 40 between mile markers 85 and 103. Utah Route 35 between mile markers 58 and 62. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
